channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15. Having had a three week break, the collection is brimming with a lot of projects, enjoy: English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 2 Genre-Agnostic Roleplaying Games 2 Family-Friendly Roleplaying Games 3 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 3 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Post-Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games 2 Settings 4 D&D 5E Settings 3 Sourcebooks 4 OSR/OSE Sourcebooks 11 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 5 System-Specific Sourcebooks 1 Adventures 2 Mörk Borg Adventures 14 D&D 5E adventures 8 Dice Projects 2 d20 Dice Projects 2 Accessoires 2 Deck of Cards 1 Map Project 3 Various RPG Projects 2 Various Projects German Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game 1 Adventure Spanish Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Gamebook French Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 1 Setting 2 Adventures Ended Projects: 7 Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/05/15/crowdfunding-collection-196/

item.dc:creator: @Nickwedig
item.description:
@Nickwedig wrote:

I must have missed the prior edition where Misspent Youth was listed, then.

It’s weird how limited the search options are on Gamefound, now that I try to use that.

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I included Misspent Youth in the previous edition, number #195:

Teylen's RPG Corner – 25 Apr 22

Crowdfunding Collection #195

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #195, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/29 and 04/24. Due to my procrastination the collection sees quite a lot of projects. O…

I did indeed miss Desperation, as GameFound doesn’t let me search for just Crowdfunding campaigns, thank you for the pointer

Read full topic
item.source: Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15
item.dc:creator: @Nickwedig
item.description:
@Nickwedig wrote:

You seem to have missed both Misspent Youth on Kickstarter and Desperation on Gamefound.

Kickstarter

Misspent Youth: Fall in Love, Not in Line

Teenage rebellion in a messed-up future! Play the only kids that can stop the adults from ruining what's left of the world.

gamefound.com

Desperation by Bully Pulpit Games

Desperation provides a unique, card-driven game play for gothic storytelling experiences steeped in actual history

Read full topic

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #196, including every tabletop rpg project started between 04/24 and 05/15.

Having had a three week break, the collection is brimming with a lot of projects, enjoy:

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
2 Genre-Agnostic Roleplaying Games
2 Family-Friendly Roleplaying Games
3 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
3 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Post-Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games
2 Settings
4 D&D 5E Settings
3 Sourcebooks
4 OSR/OSE Sourcebooks
11 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
5 System-Specific Sourcebooks
1 Adventures
2 Mörk Borg Adventures
14 D&D 5E adventures
8 Dice Projects
2 d20 Dice Projects
2 Accessoires
2 Deck of Cards
1 Map Project
3 Various RPG Projects
2 Various Projects

German Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
1 Adventure

Spanish Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Gamebook

French Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
1 Setting
2 Adventures

Ended Projects: 7
